text:
하루 종일 팀 스케줄 하고 들어오면
혼자 시간을 보내고 싶어서
일부러 산책 가기도 하고
문 닫고 방에서 안 나오기도 하는 저였는데
항상 제 컨디션이나 기분을 살펴주면서
저를 항상 보듬어 주는 형이거든요
입장 바꿔서 생각해 보면
기분 나쁜 일도 참 많았을 거 같은데
정한이형은 한 번도 뭐라 한 적이 없는 거 같아요
배달음식 시켜두고 저는 잠들어서 벨 울리면
형은 자다가 방에서 나와서까지 나가서
벨 꺼주고
아침에 픽업할 때
잠에서 못 깨서 맨날 늦는 저를
짜증 한번 안 내고 기다려주고
가끔 숙소에서 숨어있다가
귀신인 척 놀랠 때면 진짜 가만 안 두고 싶지만
(머리가 길어서 진짜 귀신같아 보임)
혼자 밥 먹을 때는 왜 혼자 먹냐고 앞에 있어주고
가끔 제 고향 친구나 동료 들을 데려오는 날에는
항상 반갑게 맞이해주고
옆에서 자리해 주면서
저희 얘기를 꼭 들어주고 자기 방으로 들어가요
그래서 제 주변에서도 정한이형을 다 좋아해요
주기적으로 정한이형 안부를 묻고
보고 싶다고 찾아오는 사람도 많답니다ㅎ
정한이형 복무 시작일이랑
trans:
When I came back from a team schedule,
I often wanted some time alone.
I'd either go for a walk
or close the door and stay in my room.
Even then, he always looked out for me,
keeping an eye on how I was doing and what mood I was in.
If I think about it,
there must have been plenty of frustrating moments for him,
but Jeonghan never said a word about it.
When I ordered delivery,
he'd come out of his room as soon as the bell rang
and turn it off for me.
There were mornings
I couldn’t get up on time,
but instead of getting annoyed, he just waited patiently for me.
When he hides in the dorm
and suddenly pretends to be a ghost to scare me, it makes me want to get back at him so badly.
(Honestly, with his long hair, he really did look like one!)
If I was eating alone, he’d ask, “Why are you eating by yourself?” and sitting in front of me
And when I brought hometown friends or colleagues over,
he always made a point to greet them.
He’d listen to our conversations for a bit next to us
and then quietly retreat to his room.
Everyone around me seems to like Jeonghan.
There are quite a few people who regularly ask how Jeonghan is doing
and even come by saying they miss him. Haha!
His military service start date coincided with...
